detailsOfAchievement: The Nar Seva Samiti has reached more than 100 Gram Panchayats of Distt. Chamba of Himachal Pradesh to see the geographical condition of the area and had meeting with the villagers to know their living, livelihood,etc. This visit is continuous. We discuss with them the literacy, out-of-school children, girl education, dowry, SSA, RMSA, Swachchh Bharat, Yog, Make-in-India, child labour, drug abuse, population control, modern and organic agriculture, health, extincting crops, floriculture, horticulture, milk production, monkey problems, etc. Besides, we also study their culture and living style.
